item.title: Git
item.description: # 多账号配置 # mkdir -p ~/.ssh && cd ~/.ssh ssh-keygen -t rsa -C cmp@abc.com -f ~/.ssh/github_id_rsa ssh-keygen -t rsa -C me@abc.com -f ~/.ssh/github_id_rsa_me ssh-add -D ssh-add -l # 配置公钥 vi config # cmp Host github.com HostName github.com PreferredAuthentications publickey IdentityFile ~/.ssh/github_id_rsa User ademain # me Host github.com-me HostName github.com PreferredAuthentications publickey IdentityFile ~/.ssh/github_id_rsa_me User ademain 测试 ssh -T git@github.com-me

item.title: Hugo
item.description: # 搭建 # brew install hugo && hugo new site bonvoyage cd bonvoyage && git init git submodule add https://github.com/alex-shpak/hugo-book themes/hugo-book echo theme = \'hugo-book\' >> config.toml hugo new docs/hugo.md hugo server -D 配置 # vim config.toml baseURL = "me.github.io" languageCode = "zh-CN" title = "A demain" theme = "hugo-book" 配置Github # # create a new repository with name `me.github.io`, change config.toml baseURL to `me.github.io` hugo -D cd public git init git config user.
